
Log into github
At top right user-icon, select [Settings]
At bottom-left, click [<> Developer settings]
At top-left, click [Personal access tokens \/] drop-down
Click [Fine grained tokens]
Click [Generate new token]
Enter [Token name]
For [Resource owner] drop-down, select [cyber-dojo]
Fill in Expiration, Description, Repo access, Permissions
Click [Generate token]
Save the generated token as an Org secret.
